dn15:1.2: kammāsadhammaṃ nāma → kammāsadammaṃ nāma (bj, sya-all, km); kammāssadhammaṃ nāma (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn15:4.3: sarīsapānaṃ vā sarīsapattāya → siriṃsapānaṃ vā siriṃsapattāya (bj, km, pts-vp-pli1ed); siriṃsapānaṃ siriṃsapattāya (sya-all)
dn15:32.11: yāvatā vaṭṭaṃ, yāvatā vaṭṭati → yāvatā vaṭṭaṃ vaṭṭati (si), vattati tāvatā vaṭṭaṃ vattati (km), yavatā vaṭṭaṃ yāvatā vaṭṭaṃ vaṭṭati (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn15:33.1: Satta kho, ānanda → satta kho imā ānanda (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
